fuse

Class FuseOpen

  • java.lang.Object
    • fuse.util.Struct
      • fuse.FuseOpen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FuseOpenSetter, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class FuseOpen
extends Struct
implements FuseOpenSetter
    An implementation of FuseOpenSetter interface that is passed as an argument to fuse.Filesystem3.open() callback method to return filehandle and open options from it.
